item.title: Melissa add a quote by Robert A. Heinlein
item.description: "Happiness consists in getting enough sleep. Just that, nothing more." -- Robert A. Heinlein

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Nora Ephron
item.description: "Above all, be the heroine of your life, not the victim." -- Nora Ephron

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Gregory Maguire
item.description: "People who claim that they're evil are usually no worse than the rest of us... It's people who claim that they're good, or any way better than the rest of us, that you have to be wary of." -- Gregory Maguire

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Gene Stratton-Porter
item.description: "If you are lazy, and accept your lot, you may live in it. If you are willing to work, you can write your name anywhere you choose." -- Gene Stratton-Porter

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Betty Friedan
item.description: "Aging is not 'lost youth' but a new stage of opportunity and strength." -- Betty Friedan

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Gabriel García Márquez
item.description: "No medicine cures what happiness cannot." -- Gabriel García Márquez

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Barbara Kingsolver
item.description: "Don’t try to make life a mathematics problem with yourself in the center and everything coming out equal. When you’re good, bad things can still happen. And if you’re bad, you can still be lucky." -- Barbara Kingsolver

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Charles Bukowski
item.description: "what matters most is how well you walk through the fire" -- Charles Bukowski
